Container.Name: bosun
Container.Overview:
Helm for home. GitOps for Docker Compose on bare metal.
You're the captain of your homelab. 40 containers. Traefik. Secrets everywhere. You shouldn't have to swab the deck yourself. That's what the bosun is for.
git push → bosun receives orders → crew deployed → yacht runs smooth
Features: - Native GitHub webhook receiver for instant deploys - SOPS + Age for encrypted secrets - Go templates with Sprig for config rendering - Configurable polling interval (default: hourly) - Discord, SendGrid, and Twilio notifications - Health and readiness endpoints - Prometheus metrics
Container.Requires: Requires a GitHub repository with your Docker Compose configs. Requires an Age key for SOPS secret decryption. Optional: Tailscale for webhook exposure, Discord/SendGrid/Twilio for notifications.

Config.Name: Config Path
Config.Description: Configuration and state directory. Contains age key, repo clone, rendered configs.

Config.Name: Git Repository URL
Config.Description: HTTPS URL to your GitOps config repository (e.g., https://github.com/user/infrastructure.git)

Config.Name: Webhook Port
Config.Description: Port for GitHub webhook listener and health endpoint

Config.Name: Age Key File
Config.Description: Path to Age private key for SOPS decryption. Generate with: age-keygen -o age-key.txt

Config.Name: GitHub Webhook Secret
Config.Description: Secret for validating GitHub webhook signatures. Must match webhook config in GitHub.

Config.Name: Docker Socket
Config.Description: Docker socket for running compose commands. Required for deployments.

Config.Name: Compose Projects Path
Config.Description: Path to Docker Compose Manager projects (Unraid default shown)

Config.Name: Discord Webhook URL
Config.Description: Discord webhook URL for deployment notifications (optional)

Config.Name: Poll Interval
Config.Description: Seconds between git poll checks (default: 3600 = 1 hour). Set to 0 to disable.

Config.Name: Secrets File
Config.Description: Path to encrypted secrets file in repo (relative to repo root)

Config.Name: Compose Directory
Config.Description: Directory containing compose templates in repo (relative to repo root)
